messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 531
messages.messageBody:
<<He is very much into
video gaming, and part of letting go of his friends
after this summer, was losing their companionship in
his interests. Maybe we'll have to broaden a bit and
get out more to see if anything else strikes his
fancy.>>

In response to the "very much into" video gaming...
I didn't know if you were aware of a *fairly new?*
place called Techie in Marlboro. It is all video
games. Some games are interconnected & they have
tournaments, etc....
My son loves it, & so does his cousins & friends..
It is on the corner of HOsmer St & East Main ST and it
very inexpensive. $4 an hr.

That *might* be a way for him to meet others
interested in the same thing. They also have a web
site if you'd like to check it ahead of time.
